name: SMSA Shipping(official)
author: SMSA Express

sections.description:
It’s the golden rule, whether selling online, at a bricks and mortar shop or through a chain of superstores.

At SMSA, we value clientele the same way, so we understand the link between exceptional service and a loyal customer base. Our first-class service lets you pass on benefits to your patrons.

Our network of outlets across the world is a simple, fast and cost-effective way of moving goods around the country. Our global partnerships and customs expertise simplifies and speeds up the process of importing the products your customers want.

We help stores big and small manage the flow of products in from suppliers and out to consumers with automated shipping solutions and supply chain management. These days, more and more sales happen online. Customers expect customized shipping at their virtual checkout. We help strengthen a store’s online brand with built-in shipping and tracking software, adapted to suit your business.

Some of the ways we serve the retail/e-commerce sector :

  • A worldwide network of outlets for fast, economical delivery.
  • Supply chain management.
  • In-store logistics.
  • Customizable, user-friendly shipping software.
  • Real-time tracking and status reports.
  • Customs clearance and import expertise for international products.
  • The fast, professional shipping service your customers deserve.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended
  • Ghostscript(GS) must be install and enable on the server https://www.ghostscript.com/doc/current/Install.htm

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handles the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of SMSA Shipping, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New.”

In the search field type “SMSA Shipping,” then click “Search Plugins.” Once you’ve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click “Install Now,” and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the SMSA Shipping plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Woocommerce Addon

SMSA Shipping (Official) is a Woocommerce addon plugin that extends the shipping functionality of the Woocommerce store. After installation, you have to fill in the SMSA credentials under the woocommerce shipping settings page.

Get SMSA Account detials

SMSA sipping (Official) plugin requires an API key. Sign in to your SMSA E-Commerce dashboard and navigate to API documents to copy the API key. If you don’t have access to SMSA E-Commerce Dashboard, please email us at info@smsaexpress.com to enable you to ship via SMSA.

Features

  • This plugin uses SMSA’s latest technologies. 
  • Automate your shipping, returns, and tracking with SMSA. 
  • Fully integrated with Woocommerce, enabling you to utilize all SMSA e-commerce services. 
  • 24/7 support to ensure that no orders are left behind at your fulfillment centers.
  • Continuous development and innovation that ensure regular updates are released.
sections.changelog:
1.9

  • New look and feel. 
  • One dashboard for all your logistics requirements (ship, return, print, and track).
  • SMSA shipment number will be auto-linked to your order. 
  • Automatic status updates upon shipping. 
  • Manage SMSA service types. 
  • Manage the COD currency. 
  • Item SKU and quantity are added to the shipping label for easy fulfillment.

upgrade_notice.1.9: It's highly recommended that you install the new updates to ensure having SMSA's latest services enabled and available to your customers.
